00036 const std::string SMALL_CEL_FILE = "../data/small_cel_file";
00037 const std::string SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_OUTLIER_NO_MASK = "../data/small_cel_file_no_outlier_no_mask";
00038 const std::string SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_STDEV = "../data/small_cel_file_no_stdev";
00039 const std::string LARGE_CEL_FILE = "../data/large_cel_file";
00040 const std::string SMALL_UINT16_CEL_FILE = "../data/small_uint16_cel_file";
00041 
00042 static int32_t intenTestValues[4] = {55683, 4568, 2368, 100};
00043 static float stdevTestValues[4] = {2.345f, 56.23f, 1.53f, 3.875f};
00044

00056 {
00057         CelFileReader reader;
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00061 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileNoOutlierNoMaskTest()
00062 {
00063         CelFileData data;
00064         CelFileReader reader;
00065         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_OUTLIER_NO_MASK);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00067 
00068         // Read some data
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_OUTLIER_NO_MASK);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetVersion() == 1);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgorithmName() == L"Feature Extraction");
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 2);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 10);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == true);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00078 
00079         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00080         data.GetAlgorithmParameters(params);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetName() == L"percentile");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetValueFloat() == 0.75f);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetName() == L"outlierlow");
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetValueFloat() == 1.004f);
00086 
00087         float intensity;
00088         int16_t numPixels;
00089         bool outlier, masked;
00090         float stdev;
00091 
00092         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00093 
00094         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00095         {
00096                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00097 
00098                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00099                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == .5*cell);
00100                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00101 
00102                 // Check the values
00103                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(outlier == false);
00104                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(masked == false);
00105         }
00106 
00107         FloatVector vInten;
00108         FloatVector vStdev;
00109         Int16Vector vPixels;
00110         BoolVector vOutliers;
00111         BoolVector vMasked;
00112 
00113         // Get individual columns
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev));
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers) == false);
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked) == false);
00119 
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten.size() == 10);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev.size() == 10);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels.size() == 10);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vOutliers.size() == 0);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vMasked.size() == 0);
00125         
00126         // Check values
00127         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00128         {
00129                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00130                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev[cell] == .5*cell);
00131                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00132         }
00133 
00134         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00135         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00136         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00137         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 0);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 0);
00140 }
00141 
00142 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileTest()
00143 {
00144         CelFileData data;
00145         CelFileReader reader;
00146         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00148 
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_CEL_FILE);
00150         CheckSmallCelFileHeader(data);
00151 
00152         float intensity;
00153         int16_t numPixels;
00154         bool outlier, masked;
00155         float stdev;
00156 
00157         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00158 
00159         FloatVector vInten;
00160         FloatVector vStdev;
00161         Int16Vector vPixels;
00162         BoolVector vOutliers;
00163         BoolVector vMasked;
00164 
00165         // Get individual columns
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev));
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers));
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked));
00171 
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten.size() == 25);
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev.size() == 25);
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels.size() == 25);
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vOutliers.size() == 25);
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vMasked.size() == 25);
00177 
00178         
00179         // Check values
00180         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00181         {
00182                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00183                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev[cell] == .5*cell);
00184                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00185                 CheckOutlier(cell, vOutliers[cell]);
00186                 CheckMasked(cell, vMasked[cell]);
00187         }
00188 
00189         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00190         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00191         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00192         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00195 
00196         // Change the order of operations in the test
00197         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00198         {
00199                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00200 
00201                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00202                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == .5*cell);
00203                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00204 
00205                 CheckOutlier(cell, outlier);
00206                 CheckMasked(cell, masked);
00207         }
00208 }
00209 
00210 void CelFileReaderTest::CheckSmallCelFileHeader(CelFileData& data)
00211 {
00212         // Read some data
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetVersion() == 1);
00214         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgorithmName() == L"Feature Extraction");
00216         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00218         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 25);
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == true);
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00221 
00222         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00223         data.GetAlgorithmParameters(params);
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00225         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetName() == L"percentile");
00226         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetValueFloat() == 0.75f);
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetName() == L"outlierlow");
00228         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetValueFloat() == 1.004f);
00229 }

00231 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileNoStdevTest()
00232 {
00233         CelFileData data;
00234         CelFileReader reader;
00235         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_STDEV);
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00237 
00238         // Read some data
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_STDEV);
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetVersion() == 1);
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgorithmName() == L"Feature Extraction");
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 25);
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == false);
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00248 
00249         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00250         data.GetAlgorithmParameters(params);
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00252         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetName() == L"percentile");
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetValueFloat() == 0.75f);
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetName() == L"outlierlow");
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetValueFloat() == 1.004f);
00256 
00257         float intensity;
00258         int16_t numPixels;
00259         bool outlier, masked;
00260         float stdev;
00261 
00262         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00263 
00264         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00265         {
00266                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00267 
00268                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00269                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == 0);
00270                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00271 
00272                 CheckOutlier(cell, outlier);
00273                 CheckMasked(cell, masked);
00274         }
00275 
00276         FloatVector vInten;
00277         FloatVector vStdev;
00278         Int16Vector vPixels;
00279         BoolVector vOutliers;
00280         BoolVector vMasked;
00281 
00282         // Get individual columns
00283         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00284         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev) == false);
00285         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00286         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers));
00287         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked));
00288         
00289         // Check values
00290         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00291         {
00292                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00293                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00294 
00295                 CheckOutlier(cell, vOutliers[cell]);
00296                 CheckMasked(cell, vMasked[cell]);
00297         }
00298 
00299         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00300         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00301         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00302         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00303         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00304         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00305 }

00307 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadLargeCelFileCheckHeaderTest()
00308 {
00309         CelFileData data;
00310         CelFileReader reader;
00311         reader.SetFilename(LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00312         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00313 
00314         const int32_t cols = 2560;
00315         const int32_t rows = 2560;
00316         const int32_t expectedCells = rows*cols;
00317 
00318         // Read some data
00319         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00320         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == rows);
00321         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == cols);
00322         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == expectedCells);
00323         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == true);
00324         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00325 }
00326 
00327 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadLargeCelFileSingleDataAccessTest()
00328 {
00329         CelFileData data;
00330         CelFileReader reader;
00331         reader.SetFilename(LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00332         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00333 
00334         const int32_t cols = 2560;
00335         const int32_t rows = 2560;
00336         //const int32_t expectedCells = rows*cols;
00337 
00338         // Declare buffers
00339         float* intensities = new float[cols];
00340         int32_t* expectedIntensities = new int32_t[cols];
00341         float* stdev = new float[cols];
00342         float* expectedStdev = new float[cols];
00343         int16_t* numPixels = new int16_t[cols];
00344         int16_t* expectedNumPixels = new int16_t[cols];
00345         bool outlier, masked;
00346 
00347         // This is slow. Spot check
00348         for (int32_t row = 0, cell = 0, testIdx = 0;
00349                          row < rows;
00350                          row+=100, cell+=(100*cols) )
00351         {
00352                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col, ++cell, ++testIdx)
00353                 {
00354                         // Get the data
00355                         data.GetData(cell, intensities[col], stdev[col], numPixels[col], outlier, masked);
00356 
00357                         // Compute the expected values
00358                         if (testIdx >= 4)
00359                                 testIdx = 0;
00360 
00361                         expectedIntensities[col] = intenTestValues[testIdx];
00362                         expectedStdev[col] = stdevTestValues[testIdx];
00363                         expectedNumPixels[col] = 25;
00364                 }
00365                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(intensities, expectedIntensities, sizeof(int32_t)*cols) == 0);
00366                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(stdev, expectedStdev, sizeof(float)*cols) == 0);
00367                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(numPixels, expectedNumPixels, sizeof(int16_t)*cols) == 0);
00368         }
00369 
00370 
00371         // clean up
00372         delete [] intensities;
00373         delete [] expectedIntensities;
00374         delete [] stdev;
00375         delete [] expectedStdev;
00376         delete [] numPixels;
00377         delete [] expectedNumPixels;
00378 
00379 }

00381 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadLargeCelFileVectorDataAccessTest()
00382 {
00383         CelFileData data;
00384         CelFileReader reader;
00385         reader.SetFilename(LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00386         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00387 
00388         const int32_t cols = 2560;
00389         const int32_t rows = 2560;
00390         //const int32_t expectedCells = rows*cols;
00391 
00392         FloatVector vInten;
00393         FloatVector vStdev;
00394         Int16Vector vPixels;
00395         BoolVector vOutliers;
00396         BoolVector vMasked;
00397 
00398         // This needs to be faster. Spot check
00399         for (int32_t row = 0/*, testIdx = 0*/; row < rows; row+=100)
00400         {
00401                 data.GetIntensities(row*cols, cols*100, vInten);
00402                 data.GetStdev(row*cols, cols*100, vStdev);
00403                 data.GetNumPixels(row*cols, cols*100, vPixels);
00404 
00405                 for (int32_t col = 0, testIdx = 0; col < cols; ++col, ++testIdx)
00406                 {
00407                         // Compute the expected values
00408                         if (testIdx >= 4)
00409                                 testIdx = 0;
00410 
00411                         if (vInten[col] != intenTestValues[testIdx] ||
00412                                         vStdev[col] != stdevTestValues[testIdx] ||
00413                                         vPixels[col] != 25)
00414                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);      // this is slow, only execute it when needed.
00415                 }
00416         }
00417         
00418 
00419 /*
00420         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00421         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00422         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00423         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00424         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00425         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00426 */
00427 }
00428 
00429 void CelFileReaderTest::CheckOutlier(int32_t cell, bool outlier)
00430 {
00431         if (cell == 0 || cell == 11 /*(1,2)*/)
00432                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(outlier == true);
00433         else
00434                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(outlier == false);
00435 }
00436 
00437 void CelFileReaderTest::CheckMasked(int32_t cell, bool masked)
00438 {
00439         if (cell == 1 /*(1,0)*/ || cell == 7 /*(2,1)*/ || cell == 13/*(3,2)*/)
00440                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(masked == true);
00441         else
00442                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(masked == false);
00443 }
00444

00446 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileGetOutlierCoordsTest()
00447 {
00448         CelFileData data;
00449         CelFileReader reader;
00450         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE);
00451         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00452 
00453         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00454         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00455         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00456 }

00471 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallUInt16CelFile()
00472 {
00473         CelFileData data;
00474         CelFileReader reader;
00475         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_UINT16_CEL_FILE);
00476         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00477 
00478         // Read some data
00479         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_UINT16_CEL_FILE);
00480 
00481         CheckSmallCelFileHeader(data);
00482 
00483         float intensity;
00484         int16_t numPixels;
00485         bool outlier, masked;
00486         float stdev;
00487 
00488         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00489 
00490         FloatVector vInten;
00491         FloatVector vStdev;
00492         Int16Vector vPixels;
00493         BoolVector vOutliers;
00494         BoolVector vMasked;
00495 
00496         // Get individual columns
00497         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00498         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev));
00499         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00500         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers));
00501         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked));
00502 
00503         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten.size() == 25);
00504         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev.size() == 25);
00505         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels.size() == 25);
00506         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vOutliers.size() == 25);
00507         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vMasked.size() == 25);
00508 
00509         
00510         // Check values
00511         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00512         {
00513                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00514                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev[cell] == .5*cell);
00515                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00516                 CheckOutlier(cell, vOutliers[cell]);
00517                 CheckMasked(cell, vMasked[cell]);
00518         }
00519 
00520         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00521         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00522         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00523         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00524         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00525         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00526 
00527         // Change the order of operations in the test
00528         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00529         {
00530                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00531 
00532                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00533                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == .5*cell);
00534                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00535 
00536                 CheckOutlier(cell, outlier);
00537                 CheckMasked(cell, masked);
00538         }
00539 }
00540 
00541 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadMultiChannelCelFileTest()
00542 {
00543         CelFileData data;
00544         CelFileReader reader;
00545         reader.SetFilename("../data/multi_channel.CEL");
00546         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00547 
00548         //read intensities in a wavelength (ie channel or data group)
00549         data.SetActiveChannel(L"531");
00550         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 2214144);
00551         FloatVector floats;
00552         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, 3, floats));
00553         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[0], 558.0, 0.1);
00554         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[1], 3953.3, 0.1);
00555         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[2], 637.5, 0.1);
00556 
00557         //read intensities in the next wavelength
00558         data.SetActiveChannel(L"609");
00559         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 2214144);
00560         floats.clear();
00561         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(3, 3, floats));
00562         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[0], 3983.0, 0.1);
00563         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[1], 477.0, 0.1);
00564         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[2], 522.5, 0.1);
00565 
00566         //switch back to previous wavelength and read standard devs
00567         data.SetActiveChannel(L"531");
00568         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 2214144);
00569         floats.clear();
00570         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, 3, floats));
00571         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[0], 71.4, 0.1);
00572         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[1], 240.8, 0.1);
00573         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[2], 64.4, 0.1);
00574 
00575         //switch wavelength again and read standard devs
00576         data.SetActiveChannel(L"609");
00577         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 2214144);
00578         floats.clear();
00579         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(3, 3, floats));
00580         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[0], 317.0, 0.1);
00581         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[1], 61.09, 0.1);
00582         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(floats[2], 84.3, 0.1);
00583 }
